name: Castle Keeperz
description:
Version: 0.1

Hello my lord!

Start a little fight against the ai and get back your kingdoms.

The game is a prototype and in early development.

I will upgrade the game with the time, but want to share it with you for free if you like to play it already :)

The game is made with Godot 3.5 <3

Todo's that i got on my list:

  • better graphics for the castles and villages
  • add more level backgrounds
  • add more units
  • add diffrent enemy types like skeleton or goblins instead of human
  • upgrade system for your units
  • more sounds and music

Enjoy!
